participants.name: Hadil Sabbagh, Ph. D.
participants.title: Systems Team Lead at Wells Fargo Bank

messages.message: You're a genius! I need some help with my gray matter.

Good idea working on athletes. Assuming we eventually find a point in time where we can truly measure the current state of intelligence, how do I best prepare myself for uploading my mind in to a computer? I think it is by tracking as many reference points as possible for testing completeness of the process.
How can I help you in the meantime?
I look forward to hearing about your ambition.
Thanks for endorsing me for Java!
Haha, do you still use Java regularly?
